featured.text: A player of Mills had possession of the ball, and Deborah ran to guard against her.
The game was against Mills High School.

definition.zh_def: 磨坊；工廠，特別是用於加工或生產的地方。
definition.en_def: A building or facility where raw materials are processed or manufactured, often involving grinding or milling.
definition.example: The old mills by the river have been converted into luxury apartments.
